name: Code Name: Omega
description:
By Henk F., Aiden Y., and Bruce Z.

Please play in fullscreen mode using the button on the lower right of the game window.

Controls:

  • Press 1,2,3,4 to switch weapons
  • Press A or D to move left & right
  • Press Space to jump ( You have the ability to double-jump)
  • Press R to reload
  • Press T to reset the game.

Code Name: Omega is a 2D shooter game that involves heavily involves decision making & reaction capability. The story for this game happens in 2060, where artificial intelligence technology grows out of control. In the game, players are going to roll-play as a robot named “Theta,” who went to investigate a huge factory owned by multi-nation cooperation - ARC. As soon as he steps into the factory, he discovered that an artificial intelligence called “Omega” has already taken over the control for the factory, and those robot engineers have weapons pointing to him. Without hesitation, he called for backup. While the reinforcements are on their way, the player will have to survive for 2 minutes and try to clear a path.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
